pages.text: $(li)The Lukewarm Ocean is a variant of the Ocean biome.$(br)$(li)It can be found in the Overworld.$(br)$(li)The surface of this place is composed mainly by Sand blocks.$(br)$(li)You can find some water vegetation here like Seagrass or Kelp Plants.
$(li)Some aquatic animals like Cods, Pufferfishes, Tropical Fishes, Dolphins, Squids, Cachalot Whales and Hammerhead Sharks can be found here too.
